Join Science Mom and Math Dad for a semester-long dive into Earth Science! Weâ€™ve designed this course especially for 4th-5th grade students and their teachers, but the course is also a good fit for a younger student or a middle schooler who is passionate about science. You can download the notes for free to see the schedule and supply list.
